content: temperature blanket crochet pattern color chart tutorial printable calendar temperatures year throw colorful seed stitch the free pattern is available on our blog www foxandpinestitches com or purchase the ad-free printable version here that includes the blank calendar color chart and other helpful pages to plan and organize your temperature blanket project there s no better way to ring in the new year than planning out a fun year-long crochet project this pattern will give you all the information you need to plan out your own temperature blanket when january rolls around knitters and crocheters see temperature blankets popping up all over pinterest ravelry instagram and facebook groups one saturday morning last january i was browsing pinterest and fell into the rabbit hole of temperature blankets while enjoying my morning coffee i was inspired off to michael s i went and a few hours later i was starting my first row in my blanket i m happy to share with you how i made mine in hopes it inspires you to make one of your own the pattern includes helpful tips how to plan out your temperature range/colors based on your location websites to track the temperature throughout the year a simple crochet blanket pattern printable calendar and color chart you are welcome to join our facebook group to share your work in progress and see how others are making theirs https //www facebook com/groups/foxandpinetemperatureblanket tag us on instagram @foxandpinestitches and use the hashtag #foxandpinetemperatureblanket to share your work in progress check out our brand new stitch stoppers in our shop www foxandpinestitches com follow fox & pine stitches instagram @foxandpinestitches facebook facebook com/foxandpinestitches ravelry ravelry com/designers/tara-marie-2 pinterest pinterest com/foxandpinestitches blog foxandpinestitches com pattern and photos are the property of fox & pine stitches copying altering or sharing the pattern and claiming it as your own is strictly prohibited you have permission to sell items made with this pattern but credit must be given to the designer in any online listings/websites pattern credit www foxandpinestitches com you may not use our photos for your own listings tagging us on social media is greatly appreciated
